articles.title: Space debris: 'Grandfather satellite' due to fall to Earth - BBC.com
articles.description: Europe's pioneering ERS-2 Earth observation spacecraft will make an uncontrolled dive to destruction.
articles.content:
Artwork: Europe's Earth Remote Sensing satellites weighed about 2.5 tonnes at launch
A pioneering European satellite is due to fall to Earth in the coming hours.
ERS-2 was a cutting-edge observatio… [+4985 chars]

articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Who is Yulia Navalnaya, Putin’s new target? - The Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: Learn about Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of Alexei Navalny who is continuing his mission for a free Russia. Find out her background, her fight against Putin, and the challenges she faces. Stay updated with the latest news.
articles.content: Oldest countries in the world; India on the list
